name: Bendy Build Our Machine Song
description:
Play your favorite song from Bendy game Tiles Hop .You will love this free ball game the first time.Challenge yourself with EDM Tiles, The best Bendy game Tiles Hop songs.

Songs Inside the hop tiles game:
- Absolutely Anything

- Build Our Machine
- Can I Get An Amen
- Can't Be Erased
- HELLO NEIGHBOR SONG
- Horror Show
- Masterpiece
- Spotlight
- Uncrowned
- GOSPEL OF DISMAY
- Escape the Nightmare
- Recording Gold
- The Devil's SwingPerformed
- The Living Tombstone ft. DAGames

Game rule:
1- Choose your favorite song from the playlist
2- Swipe the screen to jump balls on tile's color, hop ball on them and control carefully and enjoy the beat!
3- Try Not to fall off the Tiles
4- Hop ball on them and control carefully and enjoy the beats
5- Unlock new songs in the music box

"Bendy game Tiles Hop Music Ball Neon EDM Rush" is now completely free! Let's enjoy this EDM music rush game right now!Enter and join the musical adventure in the world of tiles hop with us.
